      • getDaysToDeadLine

        public int getDaysToDeadLine()
        returns the number of days until the project has ended. this uses the deadline to produce a number. if the number is negative the project is over its deadline
        Returns:
        an integer representing the days until the project is due

      • getDaysToDeadLineInWords

        public java.lang.String getDaysToDeadLineInWords()
        returns the number of days as a string
        Returns:
        string when the project is due

      • getDeadlineColorClass

        public java.lang.String getDeadlineColorClass()
        gets a css color class for the days until deadline. if the deadline is 30 or more days ahead of the project, the color will be green. if its 20 or more days ahead it'll be yellow if its 10 or more it'll be orange. if its below 10 but more than 0 it'll be red and if the deadline was reached the color will be dark-red-
        Returns:
        a string representing a CSS class.

      • getTodoGroups

        public java.util.Set<TodoGroup> getTodoGroups()
        sets the todoGroups which are attached to this project.
        Returns:
        a HashSet containing every todoGroup attached to this project.
